reasoning_correctness.description: Accuracy of the reasoning process used to reach the conclusion

compliance_with_instructions.description: Adherence to the given instructions for the task

solution_efficiency.description: How efficiently the multi-agent system works to provide the solution

accuracy_of_final_answer.description: Correctness of the final answer provided by the agents

data_contamination_avoidance.description: Effectiveness in preventing data contamination by not drawing from the internet verbatim

steps_completion.description: Number of steps successfully completed by the agent to provide the answer

progress_made.description: Progression towards the task goal without unnecessary looping or barriers

traceability.description: Ability to follow the reasoning trace of the multi-agent system to understand decision-making
